document.full_text: the rays' bullpen will have to make up for the 420 appearances made by their closer, rafael soriano, and six other relievers who left as free agents after last season.
document.title: on baseball: soft spot for rays? look at bullpen
lines_and_colors: the rays' bullpen will have to make up for the 420 appearances made by their closer, rafael soriano, and six other relievers who left as free agents after last season.
